Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lankan batters were blown away by Afghanistan bowlers, particularly Fazalhaq Farooqi, who took 2 wickets in the first over, resulting in Sri Lanka scoring just 105 runs in 19.4 overs.
Bangladesh were defeated by Afghanistan, with the spin duo of Mujeeb and Rashid removing the top six batters and Bangladesh reaching 127/7 in 20 overs.
Bangladesh would be missing their ace batter, Liton Das, dearly and would be fighting to stay alive in the Asia Cup tournament.
The bowlers of both teams performed well, with Bangladesh's bowlers bowling defensively and Sri Lanka's bowlers taking one wicket each.
